title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Hello, we have this good product for your car. It is called AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. This is very strong for start car when battery is no power. It can give 4000 peak current and has big power inside, 27800 mAh, 88 Wh. This jump starter can work with all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10 liters.

This small box has many good things. It have light that you can use in dark or if you need help, with modes like flashlight, SOS, and strobe. It can charge very fast with USB quick charge 3.0 and also has type C for in and out charging. It can protect from many bad things like short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and wrong cable connection.

You can use this jump starter many times, up to 40 times when it is full. It is easy to carry and you can use for many vehicles like 12V cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.

In box, you get the Portable Battery Starter, cables for jump your car, a cable for USB-C, converter for cigarette lighter, case to carry all, and book to tell you how to use. Our team can help you any time, 24 hours, if you have questions.

Please note, this jump starter does not come with adapter. Thank you for looking at our product. We hope it can help you.

Hello, I am selling a product for your car. It is called AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. This is very good for when your car battery is not working. It can make your car start again. It has a big power, 4000 peak current, and the battery is strong, 27800 mAh, 88 Wh. This is good for petrol cars and also diesel cars up to 10 liters.

This jump starter has many good things. It has a light that you can use in the dark, and it can signal for help with SOS and strobe lights. It has two USB for charging your phone quickly. One USB can do different power like 5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A, and the other one is 5V/2.4A. It also has a Type-C port for charging the jump starter or your devices.

It is safe because it has protection from short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and wrong connection. You can carry it easily because it is portable.

You can use this jump starter up to 40 times when it is fully charged. It can be used for different vehicles like 12V cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.

In the box, you will get the Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and User Manual. We do not give an adapter with it. But we help you always, 24-hour online after-sales team is there for you.

Thank you for reading. This product can help you a lot, and we hope you will buy it.

Hello dear customer,

We introduce to you our product, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. This item is a powerful device in your car emergency. It has a peak current of 4000 and a battery capacity of 27800mAh or 88Wh. This means it is strong.

It can start all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10 liters. Very good for many vehicles like 12V cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. You can use it to start your engine up to 40 times when it is fully charged.

Our AVAPOW Car Jump Starter has many good features. It has a LED light that you can use as a flashlight or for SOS signal and strobe light for emergency. It comes with USB quick charge 3.0 to charge devices fast. The Type-C port can be used for input and output charge.

For protection, our jump starter has intelligent systems. It will keep safe from short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection.

Also, this jump starter is small and easy to carry. We include in the box the Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and User Manual. But please know, it does not come with an adapter.

We care for our customers, so we have 24-hour online after-sales team to help with any problems.

Thank you for considering AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. It is a reliable friend for your car in times of need.
